name: Breadcrumb
description: The Breadcrumb component is a bar for navigation showing current web path.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Defaults to 'responsive' or 'single' depending on content. Options: `responsive` | `single` | `multiple` | `collapse` .

props.name: icon
props.doc: Override icon displaying on the left side (Not recommended). Default: `chevron_left`.

props.name: href
props.doc: For variant `single`, set `href` for button click. Can be used instead of event/property `onClick`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: data
props.doc: List of pages to render as breadcrumbitems. Each object in data can include all properties from [BreadcrumbItem properties](/uilib/components/breadcrumb/properties#breadcrumbitem-properties).

props.name: children
props.doc: Content of the component. Can be used instead of property `data`, by adding Breadcrumbitem children `<Breadcrumb.Item {...props} />`.

props.name: navText
props.doc: Every `<nav>` on a page needs an unique aria-label text.

props.name: goBackText
props.doc: Override with a custom 'Back' text for variant `single` (Not recommended).

props.name: homeText
props.doc: Override with a custom 'Home' text (Not recommended)

props.name: backToText
props.doc: Override with a custom 'Back to...' text (Not recommended).

props.name: styleType
props.doc: Use one of the Section component style types (style_type). Defaults to `transparent`.

props.name: collapsedStyleType
props.doc: Use one of the Section component variants. Defaults to `info`.

props.name: className
props.doc: Custom className for the component root.

props.name: isCollapsed
props.doc: For variant `collapse`, override isCollapsed for the collapsed content by updating this value using the provided property `onClick`.

props.name: spacing
props.doc: Include spacing properties from [Section](/uilib/components/section/properties) in breadcrumb. If only `true` is given, the spacing will be `small`. Defaults to `false`.

events.name: onClick
events.doc: will be called by user click interaction.

events.name: onToggle
events.doc: Will be called when breadcrumb expands or collapses.
